simulation.simulation.util

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.simulation.util.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities are a set of utility methods that can be used by all classes across the project. Methods include collision detection, distance measures and vectors from one object to another.
    Author:
    S.A.M. Janssen
